items.description: A choice of ground beef, shredded beef or chicken on a thin golden fried 10" flour tortilla topped with your choice of sauce and cheese. Oven baked and garnished with green onions and tomatoes.
items.title: Mexican Pizza

items.description: Four rolled beef or chicken taquitos filled with finely chopped jalapenos and cheese in a golden fried corn tortilla. Topped with guacamole.
items.title: Taquitos

items.description: A delicious mild flavor of chilies, spices and tortillas blended to perfection. Served over grilled chicken, avocado wedges, shredded Jack cheese and cilantro. Topped with corn tortilla strips.
items.title: Tortilla Soup

items.description: Voted "Best of Phoenix" by New Times! Our homemade Mexican style soup, made with fresh garden vegetables, rice and plump meatballs. Served with your choice of corn or flour tortillas.
items.title: Albondigas Soup

items.description: A tossed green salad with your choice of topping, green onions, diced tomatoes, cheese, guacamole and sour cream. Served in a fried tortilla bowl.
items.title: Taco Salad

items.description: A crisp assortment of mixed greens, tossed with corn tortilla strips, cucumbers, cilantro and tended grilled chicken served with oriental sesame dressing.
items.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
Bean and Cheese Burro a la Carte

items.description: Grilled cod tacos with crisp cabbage, lime, pico de gallo and a spicy homemade tartar sauce in your choice of tortilla. Served with rice and ranchero beans.
items.title: Baja Fish Tacos

items.description: Choice of red chili con carne or green chili con carne burro.
items.title: #1 - Burro, Cheese Enchilada and Beans

items.description: Choice of any item with rice and beans.
items.title: 1 Item with Rice and Beans

items.description: Choice of any two items with rice and beans.
items.title: 2 Items with Rice and Beans

items.description: Choice of 6 items served with a quart of rice, a quart of beans, a pint of salsa, and 2 small bags of chips. No substitutions.
items.title: Family Style 6 Pack to Go

items.description: Shredded beef, ground beef or chicken. With choice of drink.
items.title: Kid's 2 Mini Tacos with Rice and Beans

items.description: One of our wonderful chimichangas with your choice of regular fillings topped with guacamole and sour cream and served with rice and beans.
items.title: A. Lunch Chimichanga

items.description: A rolled taco with beef or chicken and topped with guacamole and cheese. Served with rice and beans.
items.title: G. Lunch Flauta with Guacamole
